description: Retrieves the specified registration type definitions. You can use DescribeRegistrationTypeDefinitions to view the requirements for creating, filling out, and submitting each registration type.

parameters.name: RegistrationTypes
parameters.description: The type of registration form. The list of RegistrationTypes can be found using the  DescribeRegistrationTypeDefinitions action. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: An array of RegistrationFilter objects to filter the results. (dict) --- The filter definition for filtering registration types that meets a specified criteria. The name of the attribute to filter on. An array of values to filter on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute to filter on.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: An array of values to filter on.

nested_items.name: RegistrationTypeDefinitions
nested_items.description: The type of registration form. The list of RegistrationTypes can be found using the  DescribeRegistrationTypeDefinitions action.

nested_items.name: RegistrationType
nested_items.description: The type of registration form. The list of RegistrationTypes can be found using the  DescribeRegistrationTypeDefinitions action.

nested_items.name: SupportedAssociations
nested_items.description: The supported association behavior for the registration type.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: Defines the behavior of when an origination identity and registration can be associated with each other.

nested_items.name: IsoCountryCode
nested_items.description: The two-character code, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format, for the country or region.

nested_items.name: AssociationBehavior
nested_items.description: The association behavior.
ASSOCIATE_BEFORE_SUBMIT The origination identity has to be supplied when creating a registration.
ASSOCIATE_ON_APPROVAL This applies to all sender ID registrations. The sender ID will be automatically provisioned once the registration is approved.

ASSOCIATE_AFTER_COMPLETE This applies to phone number registrations when you must complete a registration first, then associate one or more phone numbers later. For example 10DLC campaigns and long codes.

nested_items.name: DisassociationBehavior
nested_items.description: The disassociation behavior.
DISASSOCIATE_ALL_CLOSES_REGISTRATION All origination identities must be disassociated from the registration before the registration can be closed.
DISASSOCIATE_ALL_ALLOWS_DELETE_REGISTRATION All origination identities must be disassociated from the registration before the registration can be deleted.
DELETE_REGISTRATION_DISASSOCIATES The registration can be deleted and all origination identities will be disasscoiated.

nested_items.name: DisplayHints
nested_items.description: Provides help information on the registration.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of the display hint.

nested_items.name: ShortDescription
nested_items.description: A short description of the display hint.

nested_items.name: LongDescription
nested_items.description: A full description of the display hint.

nested_items.name: DocumentationTitle
nested_items.description: The title of the document the display hint is associated with.

nested_items.name: DocumentationLink
nested_items.description: The link to the document the display hint is associated with.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to be used for the next set of paginated results. You don't need to supply a value for this field in the initial request.
